summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 725 m), and light levels (up 6095 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1672 m), and light levels (up 8020 lux) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 724.7m lower than yesterday, 643.1m lower than the past week, 1671.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 999.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1642.6m and 2670m.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
